name: Biology
description: Within Natural Sciences, Mathematics and Statistics, specifically Biological and related sciences, Biology is the study of the structure, function, reproduction, growth, evolution, and behaviour of all living organisms.

name: Botany
description: A branch of Biology focusing on the study of plants, including their structure, genetics, ecology, distribution, classification, and economic importance.

name: Cell biology
description: The study of cell structure and function, which is fundamental to understanding life, as part of Biology.

name: Entomology
description: The scientific study of insects, a branch of zoology, which itself is part of Biology.

name: Genetics
description: The study of genes, genetic variation, and heredity in living organisms, a core field within Biology.

name: Mycology
description: The branch of Biology concerned with the study of fungi, including their genetic and biochemical properties.

name: Zoology
description: The branch of Biology that studies the animal kingdom, including the structure, embryology, evolution, classification, habits, and distribution of all animals.
